subtitle: This very easy recipe is good for a midweek family meal.

method.text: Toss the chicken breasts in the flour until evenly coated.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan and gently fry the chicken and onion for 10 min, or until lightly browned on all sides.
In a small bowl combine the soup and milk. Stir into the frying pan. Add the peas and gently simmer for 15 min, or until the chicken is tender, stirring occasionally. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken supreme
